content: In-Center Hemodialysis You have various options for dialysis treatment, including in-center hemodialysis.During this treatment, you are taken care of by a personalized care team at the specialized dialysis care center for three 4-hour sessions a week. People prefer this dialysis treatment method because: Trained kidney care providers monitor dialysis treatments.Patients at the dialysis center can engage in social interactions with both fellow patients and staff members.Dialysis is only three times a week, leaving four days of freedom in between.After talking with a nephrologist, many individuals prefer going to a dialysis center for treatment because it aligns well with their lifestyle.
